app.util

Class FontHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.util.FontHelper

  • public class FontHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for managing font settings in this JavaFX application.

    Provides methods to change the font size and family of JavaFX nodes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      FontHelper()
